text:
Go ahead and *introduce yourself in the #introductions channel* so we can all get to know who you are! Consider answering:

- What’s your background?
- What kind of work do you do?
- How did you hear of the Slack community?
- What do you hope to get out of our community?

*Here’s the basics:*

- You’ve been pre-added to a few channels (see to the left under CHANNELS)
- Most conversation takes place in #general
- Random links and off-topic conversations take place in #random
- Find your #local-region channel by browsing in CHANNELS
label: basics
